about_the_game:
Enjoy the simulation of authentic medium tanks from 1940


This DLC grants you access to the following Tier 0 (pre-1940) medium tanks:
  • GERMAN Panzer III F
    • Main gun: 3.7cm Kw.K. 36 L / 46,5
    • Coax MG: 2 x 7.92mm MG34
    • Hull MG: 7.92mm MG34
  • BRITISH A-13 Cruiser
    • Main gun: 40mm ROQF 2pdr main gun
    • Coax MG: 7.92-mm Besa machine gun
  • FRENCH Hotchkiss 39
    • Main gun: canon de 37mm S.A. mle 1938
    • Coax MG: mitrailleuse de 7,5mm mle 1931
Upon purchase, these vehicles will be immediately available for you to access, providing supply is available at the spawn you have selected.

downloadable content may be purchased without requiring a subscription! You will pay for a DLC one time and you will own that content indefinitely.
At any time, you can subscribe to gain full access but should you choose to unsubscribe, these DLC items will remain with your account, always.

The units included in this medium armor DLC are also available with the PREMIUM subscription.

Controls

Default control keys:

  • Infantries can sit on your tank when you are not moving: they must press the "j" key while standing next to you
  • You can board a Cargo ship: press "h" when the hook is lowered near your hatch
  • All vehicles in WWII Online can be multi-crewed by two players. Even if your friend doesn't own this pack he can still control the vehicle with you

These controls can be customized through the ingame keymapper. If you don't have a joystick: just configure the controls with your keyboard and mouse.
detailed_description:
Enjoy the simulation of authentic medium tanks from 1940


This DLC grants you access to the following Tier 0 (pre-1940) medium tanks:
  • GERMAN Panzer III F
    • Main gun: 3.7cm Kw.K. 36 L / 46,5
    • Coax MG: 2 x 7.92mm MG34
    • Hull MG: 7.92mm MG34
  • BRITISH A-13 Cruiser
    • Main gun: 40mm ROQF 2pdr main gun
    • Coax MG: 7.92-mm Besa machine gun
  • FRENCH Hotchkiss 39
    • Main gun: canon de 37mm S.A. mle 1938
    • Coax MG: mitrailleuse de 7,5mm mle 1931
Upon purchase, these vehicles will be immediately available for you to access, providing supply is available at the spawn you have selected.

downloadable content may be purchased without requiring a subscription! You will pay for a DLC one time and you will own that content indefinitely.
At any time, you can subscribe to gain full access but should you choose to unsubscribe, these DLC items will remain with your account, always.

The units included in this medium armor DLC are also available with the PREMIUM subscription.

Controls

Default control keys:

  • Infantries can sit on your tank when you are not moving: they must press the "j" key while standing next to you
  • You can board a Cargo ship: press "h" when the hook is lowered near your hatch
  • All vehicles in WWII Online can be multi-crewed by two players. Even if your friend doesn't own this pack he can still control the vehicle with you

These controls can be customized through the ingame keymapper. If you don't have a joystick: just configure the controls with your keyboard and mouse.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OS X 10.10 +
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 8600 series or ATI Radeon HD 2600 Pro
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: on-board or better
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: OS Sierra 10.12.2+
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 250 or Radeon HD 4850 or better
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

name: Medium Armor Pack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 / Windows 8
  • Processor: Pentium 4 3.2 GHz or Athlon 64 3500+ (2.2 GHz) or better with SSE 2.0 support
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 8600 series or ATI Radeon HD 2600 Pro
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: on-board or better
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7 / Windows 8
  • Processor: 3 GHz Dual Core or 2.66 GHz Quad Core
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 250 or Radeon HD 4850 or better
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: on-board or better

short_description: Gain a competitive edge against all light tanks, armored cars and infantries! Join the Armored brigades and drive the Panzer III F, A-13 Cruiser and Hotchkiss 39. Multi-crew one of these tanks with a friend!
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Simplified Chinese
*languages with full audio support
